title: Muted
body: I literally just got of the 15 game Mute, and legit didn't say a word after 1 game i'm muted again? Are people just able to report you once and instant mute regardless of, if you talked or not? lol.{{champion:32}}

replies.body: You can mute players whenever you wish. Muting itself doesn't do much, it just puts a "muted" marker on your account for future reference.
